I really want it to be summer. 

Really tired of this winter.
I want summer so that I can go on hikes and camp with my friends and hang out in the forest and take pictures of sun through green leaves
I want summer so that when itâ€™s late at night I can wander into my backyard and smoke a cigarette in my boxers and watch traffic
I want summer so that I can open all the windows in my bedroom and get woken up by breeze and morning light and birds chirping and shit
I want summer so I can get off the subway 2 stops early and just walk around and buy cucumber/mango & hot sauce from the lady on the corner
I want summer so I can walk down the block and listen to everyoneâ€™s boom boxes and smell peopleâ€™s front yard BBQ and hang out on the stoops
and stay up late because itâ€™s still light out and go to neighborhoods Iâ€™ve never been to because everything is beautiful
All I want is for the summer and I can wear a t shirt and lay around in the grass and get slurpies from 7-11 and sit in my backyard
